cta.title: Start your free trial today!
cta.description: This is a clear and concise call to action that encourages users to sign up for a free trial of StreamVibe.

plans.title: Choose the plan that's right for you
plans.description: Join StreamVibe and select from our flexible subscription options tailored to suit your viewing preferences. Get ready for non-stop entertainment!

plan-card.basic-plan-description: Enjoy an extensive library of movies and shows, featuring a range of content, including recently released titles.
plan-card.standard-plan-description: Access to a wider selection of movies and shows, including most new releases and exclusive content.
plan-card.premium-plan-description: Access to a widest selection of movies and shows, including all new releases and Offline Viewing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Got questions? We've got answers! Check out our FAQ section to find answers to the most common questions about StreamVibe.
faq.first-answer: StreamVibe is a streaming service that allows you to watch movies and shows on demand.
faq.second-question: How do I sign up for StreamVibe?
faq.fourth-question: What is the StreamVibe free trial?
faq.fifth-question: What content is available on StreamVibe?
faq.sixth-question: How do I contact StreamVibe customer support?
faq.eighth-question: What are the StreamVibe payment methods?

devices.title: We Provide you streaming experience across various devices.
devices.description: With StreamVibe, you can enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows anytime, anywhere.
